title: net: TestPointToPointInterface fails
body:
# go test -run=Point -v net
=== RUN TestPointToPointInterface
--- FAIL: TestPointToPointInterface (0.00 seconds)
        interface_unix_test.go:58: testInterface.setup failed: fork/exec ip: no such file or directory
FAIL
exit status 1
FAIL    net     0.012s
# hg id                                                                     
fce50d680238 tip                                                                    
# uname -a                                                                  
Linux sob 3.2.12-gentoo #1 SMP Wed Jul 4 01:30:49 EST 2012 i686 Intel(R) Xeon(R)
CPUE5530 @ 2.40GHz GenuineIntel GNU/Linux
